alert.note: Alert for Pembina; Ramsey (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 24 at 3:46PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast North Dakota, including the following counties, Cavalier, Pembina, Ramsey and Walsh. * WHEN...Until 100 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 346 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hoople, Edinburg, Osnabrock, Adams, Milton, Fairdale, Lawton, Gardar, Union and Hove Mobile Park.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
